_description: XAU/USD (Gold) - Standard institutional parameters from the original paper
_description_zh: XAU/USD（黃金）- 論文中的標準機構參數
_source: Sukhov, S. 'Geometry of Advantage Decay' - Section 6

notes: 成本密度 2.2 pips = 佣金等效 0.70 + 點差 1.50

_analysis.interpretation: At P=20 pips, the strategy loses ~13% efficiency due to costs. This is within acceptable range for swing trading.
_analysis.interpretation_zh: 在 P=20 pips 時，策略因成本損失約 13% 效率。這對波段交易來說在可接受範圍內。
_analysis.warning_threshold: P < 3.67 pips would enter high-friction zone
